segments.label: suffix
segments.content: Known extensive atrioventricular septal aneurysm with dorsal curvature in the left ventricle. Distal ACI and proximal MCA displaced laterally. Completely surrounding arterial vessels.

segments.label: suffix
segments.content: No evidence of a fresh fracture. Changes in LWK 4/5 as described above. Cannot differentiate CT-morphologically between degenerative changes and changes within the context of (resolved) spondylodiscitis. Clinical, laboratory, and possibly MRI recommended for correlation.

extractions.extraction_text: No evidence of a fresh fracture. Changes in LWK 4/5 as described above. Cannot differentiate CT-morphologically between degenerative changes and changes within the context of (resolved) spondylodiscitis. Clinical, laboratory, and possibly MRI recommended for correlation.
